headline: ROYAL CARIBBEAN GROUP INTRODUCES 'POINTS CHOICE,' SETTING A NEW STANDARD IN TRAVEL LOYALTY
summary: Royal Caribbean Group (NYSE: RCL) is raising the bar for loyalty across the vacation industry with the introduction of Points Choice, part of a groundbreaking new program created to give loyal guests something extraordinary: the freedom to earn points on any of its three brands and apply them where they matter most, regardless of the ship they're sailing.

content.title: ROYAL CARIBBEAN GROUP INTRODUCES 'POINTS CHOICE,' SETTING A NEW STANDARD IN TRAVEL LOYALTY

thumbnail.caption: Royal Caribbean Group Introduces 'Points Choice,' Setting A New Standard In Travel Loyalty
